title: Hour 1 - NBA Finals, LIV Golf, Tom Brady
itunes:title: Hour 1 - NBA Finals, LIV Golf, Tom Brady
description:
Dan previews Game 3 of the NBA Finals and breaks down what should be expected from Draymond Green. The PGA Tour continues to lose players to the LIV Golf Tour, but will this make a difference for the future of the sport? Plus, Dan gives his thought on Tom Brady addressing rumors that linked him to the Miami Dolphins.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
